Package com.project.demo.controller

Class CommentController

java.lang.Object
com.project.demo.controller.CommentController
@RestController @RequestMapping("/api/v1/comment") public class CommentController extends Object
Author:
Kaushik Boora. The API path for comments is /api/v1/comment. This represents a Controller class for comments. This class provides CRUD operation for the resource "Comment". This controller class provides following methods,
API description
HTTP MethodPathDescription
POST/api/v1/comment/restaurant/{restaurantId}/user/{userId} Adds comment to DB and links it with User and Restaurant. Expects the comment to be present in the body and restaurant id and user id provided in the path variable.
GET/api/v1/commentFetches all the comments in the Database.
GET/api/v1/comment/{commentId} Fetches the comment whose Id is mentioned in the PathVariable.
PUT/api/v1/comment/{commentId} Updates the comment with new comment provided in the body.
DELETE/api/v1/comment/{commentId} Deletes the comment whose id is provided in the path variable.

    • createComment

      @PostMapping("/restaurant/{restaurantId}/user/{userId}") public com.project.demo.model.Comment createComment(@RequestBody com.project.demo.model.Comment comment, @PathVariable("restaurantId") long restaurantId, @PathVariable("userId") long userId)
      Adds comment to the DB and links it with appropriate restaurant and user.
      Parameters:
      comment - Comment data sent as a part of body.
      restaurantId - Id of the restaurant to which comment needs to be associated.
      userId - Id of the user to which comment needs to be associated.
      Returns:
      the comment that is created on the database.

      Parameters:
      comment - New Comment

      Returns:
